title: Miami mayor calls for Trump to 'immediately' reinstate TPS for Venezuelans
description: Higgins said the Trump administration ending TPS for Venezuelans in early 2025 was "reckless, dangerous, and wrong."
content: Higgins said the Trump administration ending TPS for Venezuelans in early 2025 was "reckless, dangerous, and wrong."
